entry.title: Hello world :)
entry.content:
This is yuka.

A language lover: I can speak Chinese, English and Japanese. Right now I'm learning Korean and German.

A lawyer: I've been learning and practicing IP law for six years. I have great passion for legal issues.

A lifelong learner: I just love learning and sharing. That's why I started this blog to share everything I have interest in.

Hope we all can enjoy this journey!
